headline.print_headline: Soth Korea Extending Ballistic Missile Range to Counter North's Threat
headline.main: Soth Korea Extending Ballistic Missile Range to Counter North's Threat

lead_paragraph: South Korea has test-fired a new ballistic missile with a range of 500 km (310 miles) and will try to extend the range to 800 km so it can strike any site in North Korea, its defense ministry said on Friday, days after Pyongyang fired a mid-range missile.
